metadata.description: Official Elide runtime plugins for Claude Code - polyglot development superpowers

plugins.name: elide
plugins.description:
Give Claude expert knowledge of Elide's polyglot runtime, enabling seamless JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Ruby development with cross-language interop, performance optimization, and WHIPLASH build system integration.
